PAD_LearnedForge.synopsis: The party comments on learning about the Adamantine Forge for the first time.
PAD_LearnedForge.how_to_trigger: * Learn about the Furnace by either:- Reading Filro's records -55; 33; -158- SwD on a dead drow in a Myconid Village 49; 43; -71- Unpetrify and talk to drow wizard 126; 45; -227

PAD_DisguisedJournal.synopsis: Players find an book on flumph mating(UND_FurnaceSearch_DisguisedDrowJournal) next to a dead drow mage. The book is unusial and weird for a drow wizard to read, however it's actually the Manual of the Adamantine forge disguised by a spell.
PAD_DisguisedJournal.how_to_trigger: - goto 48; 42; -73- pick up or read the book: S_UND_FurnaceSearch_MyconidDrowJournal

PAD_SecondForgeMention.synopsis: The party comments on learning about the Adamantine Forge from the second source (another drow wizard out of total three).
PAD_SecondForgeMention.how_to_trigger: * Learn about the Adamantine Forge from the second source

PAD_MadRecords.synopsis: The party comments on reading and attempting to decipher the records of the mad drow wizard, who was one of the three looking for the Adamantine Forge.The records mention a group who located the Adamantine Forge, laying somewhere in the depth of the Underdark, and barely survived the undefeatable protector who guarded it - the adamantine golem, who has one weakness - being heated and struck by a huge forge hammer.
PAD_MadRecords.how_to_trigger: * goto -55; 33; -158* kill Filro, loot and read his records

PAD_ThirdForgeMention.synopsis: Player has learned the last piece of knowledge pointing to the forge. This will be their third time hearing of it.
PAD_ThirdForgeMention.how_to_trigger: * Learn about the Furnace by either:- Reading Filro's records -55; 33; -158- SwD on a dead drow in a Myconid Village 49; 43; -71- Unpetrify and talk to drow wizard 126; 45; -227

PAD_JournalTransformed.synopsis: The dead drow wizard had a book that was covered by a spell, hiding that this is the Manual of the Adamantine Forge. Now the spell effect was removed or suppressed (by a Sussur Tree flower effect or by dispel magic etc.), the party comments on the tranformation. The party is probably already aware that the book was special (or even know that it was under a spell effect).
PAD_JournalTransformed.how_to_trigger: - goto 48; 42; -73- read or pickup S_UND_FurnaceSearch_MyconidDrowJournal- bring a Sussur Tree flower next to it
